---
title: "ggplot2"
output: plot pic
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
cars <- read.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/PyRookie/a2-DataVis-5ways/main/cars-sample.csv")
```

## Including Plots

```{r cars, echo=FALSE}
ggplot(cars, aes(x=Weight, y=MPG, size=Weight, color=Manufacturer)) + 
  geom_point(alpha = 0.5)
```
